tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quantum_circuits (
    circuit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_name TEXT,
    design TEXT,
    optimization_strategy TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE circuit_optimization_mapping (
    mapping_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_id INT NOT NULL,
    strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (circuit_id) REFERENCES quantum_circuits(circuit_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES optimization_strategies(strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_circuits (
    circuit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    instructions TEXT[] NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    modified_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE optimization_strategies (
    strategy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    optimization_steps JSONB NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    modified_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE hardware_configurations (
    configuration_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    configuration_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    qubit_count INT NOT NULL,
    connection_matrix JSONB NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    modified_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_registers (
    register_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    register_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    qubits_allocated INT[] NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    modified_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE circuit_optimization (
    circuit_id INT REFERENCES quantum_circuits(circuit_id),
    strategy_id INT REFERENCES optimization_strategies(strategy_id),
    optimization_start TIMESTAMP,
    optimization_end TIMESTAMP,
    optimization_status VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (circuit_id, strategy_id)
);
